NewsArticle.Title: Itemshop Trade-In
NewsArticle.Content:
All bank merchants will have the Itemshop Trade-In feature. Players can trade some of their itemhop items for practical item(s). Only items for the Secondary Head, Secondary Body, Accessory 1 and Accessory 2 can be traded.
You can exchange one itemshop item for one of the following: 1 Warranty Bag 3 Medenia Songs 1 World Shout(x20) 2 Equipment Repairs 1 Ability Rune(x3)
